column4: karhuton, yes. And dapper you can install from the live-cd as well.
I want to boot to /dev/sda2 from hdd - how can I do that with Dapper Beta 2 CD?
no, grub is broken in the mbr of sda. I want to boot to CD, load it's kernel and mount the root system on sda2 (sda1 is windows)
No, I can't. It won't work. Bios problem
